title: A Broken Throne
description: The dragons rage, a god betrayed, the truth of fire and a queen's desire. In this fifth novel in the 'Book of One' series, the power of the shadow grows, spreading darkness across the lands as the god prepares for war. The warrior's journey turns upon a question of fate, ancient oaths are broken, and the shadow lies in wait, as the truth of fire is revealed.
author: Jordan  Baker
